metadata.name: Cab File Extraction Via Wusa.EXE From Potentially Suspicious Paths
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the "wusa.exe" (Windows Update Standalone Installer) utility to extract ".cab" files using the "/extract" argument from potentially suspicious paths.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wusa.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/extract:')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\perflogs\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the "wusa.exe" (Windows Update Standalone Installer) utility to extract ".cab" files using the "/extract" argument from potentially suspicious paths.
